description: Crick Superfood, founded by Francisca Castellanos, emerged to provide lactose-intolerant individuals with nutritious snacks made from cricket protein. Launched just before the pandemic, the company focuses on creating clean-label products that are gluten-free, preservative-free, and environmentally sustainable. With a commitment to social impact, Crick donates 5% of sales to a local food bank. The team, composed entirely of women, aims to promote alternative proteins while addressing nutritional needs and environmental concerns.
name: Crick
